excerpt: This pizza includes a crispy cauliflower base and spicy buffalo sauce for a delicious vegan twist on a classic favorite.

ingredients.name: Vegan butter, melted
ingredients.notes: Use a vegan butter such as Earth Balance

instructions.name: Prepare the Cauliflower Crust
instructions: Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, combine the riced cauliflower, ground flaxseed, and water. Mix well and let it sit for 5 minutes to thicken.
Add chickpea flour, nutritional yeast, salt, garlic powder, and onion powder. Mix until well combined.
Transfer the mixture onto the prepared baking sheet and spread it evenly into a 12-inch (30-cm) circle. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden brown and crispy.

instructions.name: Prepare the Buffalo Sauce
instructions: In a small saucepan over medium low heat, melt the vegan butter.
Add the minced garlic and onion powder. Cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
Add the hot sauce and stir until well combined.
Remove from heat and set aside.

instructions.name: Assemble the Pizza
instructions: Spread the buffalo sauce onto the cauliflower crust.
Top with sliced red onion and halved cherry tomatoes.
Sprinkle the shredded vegan cheese on top.
Bake for an additional 10 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Garnish with sliced green onion before serving.
